MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY12 postcode area of Ellesmere affecting properties in Welshampton, Coptiviney and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:37am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:25am on 23rd October 2020.
